jobDescription: The Business/Data Analyst will be responsible for analyzing and defining business needs as well as understanding and documenting gap analysis for various applications. Understand business context and problems and communicate them clearly in written and oral formatConducts interviews with management and clients representatives to gather requirementsWork with the client to understand the design and functionality requirementsReview data, identify trends and draw relevant business conclusionsTranslate high level business requirements into functional and system requirementsDocument business processes Basic Qualifications: 5+ years of related experienceFamiliarity with MISMO model and specificationsStrong SQL experienceBachelor’s degree from an accredited universityStrong written and verbal communication skills Preferred Qualifications: Advanced degree from an accredited university
